citation_details.title: Le Petit Prince Hong Kong (LPPHK): Naturalistic fMRI and EEG data from older Cantonese speakers
citation_details.author: M Momenian, Z Ma, S Wu, C Wang, J Brennan, J Hale
citation_details.abstract: Results files are available from the OpenNeuro repository ( https://openneuro.org/datasets/ds004718).  For a visual representation of the data collection structure, refer to Fig. 4.
citation_details.short_author: M Momenian, Z Ma, S Wu, et al.
